title: Amin elected Chairman of NA Standing Committee for IT
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 29 (APP):Syed Amin-ul-Haque was elected as the Chairman of the National Assembly Standing Committee on Information Technology and Telecommunication on Saturday.
Member of the National Assembly Syed Mustafa Kamal proposed Amin-ul-Haqueâ€™s name, which was seconded by Ali Qasim Gillani and Gohar Khan.
The newly elected Chairman expressed his gratitude to the committee members for unanimously electing him.
Committee members congratulated Syed Amin-ul-Haque on his election as the Chairman of the IT Standing Committee.
